name: Print Shop Deluxe Design File
summary: Learn about .PDG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: PDG files are used by older versions of Print Shop Deluxe.

description: Page design created by Broderbund's Print Shop Deluxe publishing software; contains graphics, text, and page layout information; may be used for saving brochures, calendars, invitations, newsletters, and other prints.
